string.value: Begin your last knight training before you become a #p1102000# Knight.
This time, #p1102000# has asked you to hunt the strongest of the Mimis in Ereve, the #r#o100124##ks.
You have come back after hunting the #o100124#s. #p1102000# suggested you report to #p1101002#, as you've completed your training.

Now, shall we begin your third as well as your last training to become a knight? This time, you'll be hunting #r#o100124##ks which are also known as the most challenging Mimis in Ereve. What do you think? Do you think you can do it?
Alright then. Report back to me after you hunt #r5#k #o100124#s in #b#m130010200##k. #o100124#s may be stronger than other Mimis, but with your prowess, this won't be too big a challenge.
Don't be scared. Give it a shot! You're a knight, you know. Muster your courage and come talk to me again.
You're back safe after hunting the #o100124#s. Impressive! You are now ready to advance from Noblesse and become a Knight-in-Training.
So this ends your training as a Noblesse. Go on ahead. #b#p1101002##k is waiting for you. You will have officially become a Knight-in-Training the next time I see you.
Have you not been able to defeat #b5 #o100124#s#k yet? If you don't see any #o0100124#s in #m130010200#, I suggest you try #m130010210#. You will find #o0100124#s swarming in that area.
